review: i'm kind of disolutioned. i wanted to like it, but it doesn't function at all with my 2008 RCA tv. it would flash the amazon logo for a split second and do nothing else at all. another customer complained about the same issue. amazon just thought it was defective and sent me another with the same issue. it works with the newer vizio just fine, but i wanted it for the tv that has no cable hook up. we had the kindle hooked up to it for a while but it's connected with an hdmi cable and even that has been finicky. so i think we'll be getting chromecast instead for the bedroom. too bad it doesn't support amazon instant video though. you win some you lose some i guess. not really wild about the kindle app either.  kind of would prefer something where i can see what's going on. with a toddler i have to start the same disney movie about 500 times a day, and come june i'll be strapped to a new baby and a pump while likely recovering from a csection so getting up for random things will kind of suck for a bit.
